DOC.brief_summary: Canadian Rheumatologists randomize treat participant active Psoriatic Arthritis target ( disease activity score < 2.6 ) , per routine care . The aim study determine whether treat target result great disease improvement treat patient use routine care .
DOC.brief_title: Psoriatic Arthritis Treat Target vs. Usual Care
DOC.detailed_description: Canadian Rheumatologists randomize treat participant active Psoriatic Arthritis target ( disease activity score < 2.6 ) , per routine care . The aim study determine whether treat target result great disease improvement treat patient use routine care .
DOC.criteria: Psoriatic Arthritis diagnose rheumatologist meeting ACR classification criterion PsA CASPAR criteria The subject must provide write informed consent participation study study specific procedure perform Subject 3 SJC 28 joint count Age > =18 Subject history noncompliant Serious concomitant illnesses investigator 's opinion negate ability optimally treat patient If treat TNF inhibitor , positive PPD > 5mm receive INH recommend course untreated TB ( ie CXR evidence latent infection ) . Usual screen place standard care . Pregnancy , breastfeed consider pregnancy next 12 month
